name: Bun Bun's Block Jumper
description:
Jump to the moon...  Not really! You are a block that is trying to reach the "end" of the endless world in front of you. Your goal is to stay alive while jumping on falling platforms. This game was made for a school project. This took a long time to make, so I hope you guys like it. Have fun!

Game by Yaman Caglar
